resources.string: Click the button to get a Quote!

string-array.name: array_Quotes
string-array.item: \"Iam what i am and i do what i can. \nTarsakh\"
\"People often say that motivation doesnt last.\nWell, neither does bathing.\nThat is why we recommend it daily.\"
\"The Average Person\nThinks they are above average!\"
\"You learn more from failure than from success.\nDont let it stop you.\nFailure builds character.\"
